entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
